question_text: How does memory bandwidth affect CPU performance?
answer_options: It determines how much cache the CPU can use
Low memory bandwidth can cause the CPU to remain idle while waiting for data
It changes the voltage supplied to the CPU
It determines the amount of RAM that can be installed
correct_answer: Low memory bandwidth can cause the CPU to remain idle while waiting for data
explanation: When memory bandwidth is insufficient, the CPU may have to wait for data transfers to complete, reducing system efficiency.
